snippet.title: Resistance Trilogy Trailer
snippet.description:
You are the Resistance in three spectacular shooters.

Battle through an alternative history in the 1950s in Resistance: Fall of Man as US army ranger Nathan Hale takes on a terrifying enemy - the Chimera - in a harrowing single player campaign and explosive multiplayer modes.

Prepare for battle as the Chimera and a deadly virus that could mutate human life hit the shores of the United States in Resistance 2.

Embark on a heroic journey across America in the aftermath of the Chimera's deadly invasion and put a stop to their reign of terror in Resistance 3.

Resistance Trilogy released in New Zealand on 24th May 2012.
